classmethod combine_dicts(dict1: dict, dict2: dict) → dict¶

Combines two nested dictionaries. The values from second dictionary overwrites the first one if the keys are exactly the same. The only exception to this is if the first dictionary’s value is a dict, while the second dictionary value is a string. Then the dictionary with a dictionary typed value is prioritized.

This method is meant to be used to combine query building components in dictionary form.

Parameters

  • dict1 – The first dict to combine with the second dict

  • dict2 – The second dict to combine with the first dict

Throws TypeError

If none of the parameters are dicts

classmethod create_query_from_dict(query_dict: dict, indentation: int = 0, last: bool = True) → str¶

Creates a graphQL query from the keys of a dictionary.

Parameters

  • query_dict – The dictionary to convert to a query.

  • indentation – The amount of spaces to indent the returned query.

  • last – Specifies if the function call is the last in a recursive loop.

class property update_all_info: str¶

Returns the query to update all info on the Tibber client, homes and price (client name, homes, price info, etc.)

class property update_client_info: str¶

Returns the query to update the Tibber client information (name, id, etc.).

class property update_homes_info: str¶

Returns the query to update information on all the homes (address, homes, etc.).

class property update_price_info: str¶

Returns the query to update the price for all homes (current price, yesterdays price, etc.).

tibber.networking.query_executor module¶

class tibber.networking.query_executor.QueryExecutor(websession: Optional[aiohttp.client.ClientSession] = None)¶

Bases: object

A class for executing sessions.

execute_query(access_token: str, query: str, retries: int = 3)¶

Executes a GraphQL query to the Tibber API.

Parameters

  • query – The query to send to the Tibber API.

  • retries – The amount of retries to attempt before raising an asyncio Timeout error.

async send_request(post_args: dict, retries: int = 3)¶

Sends a request to the Tibber API.

Parameters

  • post_args – The arguments to send in the Tibber API web request. The post args should contain a “headers” key with the access token authorization and a “data” key with.

  • retries – The amount of retries to attempt before raising an asyncio Timeout error.
